title: Todays Games
body: Has anyone noticed todays games are filled with nothing but toxic people? As in intent feeders, people afk'ing etc? I went from a 70% win rate during the week to 30% just from todays games. Nearly every game I've played today I've either had someone afk or sit in a side lane and refuse to help the team after lane phase is over.

replies.body: Because the Aussies are out to play. That's why!
